name: Protec The Magic Forest
description:
In an ancient world that humans struggled to dominate, a magical forest that existed since the dawn of time, resisted being turned into firewood, its troops of haughty and defiant magical creatures, prepared behind the forest's border to defend it, in an unprecedented fact the organized creatures under your command lord of the forest; they are prepared to give their lives in pursuit of a new era, where evil humans who covet to destroy the world's magic and fuelwood, launch an unprecedented attack on the ancient magical forest

When you start the game you will see 4 purchase cards available to buy players you will need to eliminate enemies to earn coins to buy them, use the left mouse button on one of the 4 cards to buy allies and defend yourself.

!¡WARNING¡!

please play it in full screen
